data.meta_description: Wahida Rehman, SunilDutt love each other. When find out about their relationship,Amitabh Bachchan, Shera's mute sharpshooting brother carries out his father orders to kill Reshma's father & her recently married brother Ranjeet. Unable to bear the grief of Gopal's widowed bride Raakhee, Shera kills his own father believing he actually pulled the trigger. After this tragedy, Reshma and Shera's family's feud will end in more tragedy as misunderstandings lead to more bloodshed between the clans.
